```{python}
#| label: fig-pll-tdc
#| echo: false
#| fig-cap: "Basic TDC implementation as a delay line with parallel capture flip-flops. The TDC delay resolution is limited two inverter delays."
import schemdraw as sd
import schemdraw.elements as elm
import schemdraw.logic as lgc
sd.svgconfig.svg2 = False

with sd.Drawing(canvas='svg') as d:
    d.config(unit=2, fontsize=14)

    elm.Line().right(d.unit/2).idot(open=True).label(r'$f_\mathrm{ref}$', loc='left')

    N_STAGES = 4 
    DFF = {}
    pos = {}
    for i in range(4):
        elm.Dot()
        d.push()
        elm.Line().down(d.unit)
        elm.Line().right(d.unit/4)
        DFF[i] = elm.DFlipFlop().anchor('D')
        elm.Line().left(d.unit/4).at(DFF[i].CLK)
        elm.Line().down(d.unit).dot()
        pos[i] = d.here
        d.pop()
        lgc.Buf().right(d.unit*2)

    elm.DotDotDot()

    elm.Line().at(pos[N_STAGES-1]).to(pos[0])
    elm.Line().at(pos[N_STAGES-1]).right(d.unit*2)
    elm.DotDotDot()
    elm.Line().at(pos[0]).left(d.unit/2).dot(open=True).label(r'$f_\mathrm{fb}$', loc='left')
```
